text: Would it not be easier to optimise the codebase/project? Sounds huge to me and I have the feeling this is due to assets?

I have one huge product (SAAS) I have build with a complete back and frontend, and this is just 60mb with a lot of assets as well. I really can’t imagine a well optimised HubSpot Marketing website will be over 50mb

<@U03ABR41A3H> Thanks for your response. We recently worked with HubSpot devs to optimize.

We are uploading our assets to the HubSpot CMS, so I don’t think that’s the issue. We have a 32mb internal component library, as well as some other dependencies that are getting us to that limit. Our actual project was less than 1mb the last time we checked with HubSpot.

Would love an analysis tool from HubSpot that could help shed light on the bundle size, if that’s something that could be added in future.
